[[File:Tim Tolkien at Pembroke College (2024).webp|thumb|Tim next to the statue he created for [[Pembroke College]] in [[2024]].]]
'''Tim Tolkien''' (born [[13 October]] [[1962]]) is [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s great-nephew, the son of [[Julian Tolkien]], [[Hilary Tolkien]]'s son. He has a brother named Nick.

Tim Tolkien is a successful sculptor.
